title: Places limitations on the amount of money that the governor may propose to spend in a given fiscal year; repealer
actClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to article 7 of the constitution, in relation to limiting the growth on New York state disbursements and creating a revenue stabilization tax reduction and debt repayment fund; repealing section 17 of article 7 of the constitution relating to authorizing the establishment of a fund to aid in the stabilization of tax revenues
